title: 5th Anniversary of Diercks Hall
description: MSOE is celebrating 5 years of being at the forefront of applied AI education. In 2019, Diercks Hall opened at MSOE, giving the university access to state-of-the-art classrooms, laboratories, and Rosie the supercomputer.

title: MSOE Involvement Fair
description: Come to the MSOE Involvement Fair to learn about the many clubs and organizations at MSOE!

title: AI Club Kickoff!
description: Welcome to the AI Club! We will be discussing who we are, what we do, and how you can get involved.

title: Introduction to Hands-on Projects
description: We will be discussing the many hands-on projects AI Club has to offer. Come hear about Research Groups and Innovation Labs!

title: Jacob Fink
description: Jacob Fink, Lead Data Analyst at Geneva Capital Management LLC, will be speaking about AI impacts his role in the financial investment industry.

title: Innovation Lab & Research Group Kickoff
description: Kickoff for the Brady Corp Innovation Lab! Come meet your Research Group and Innovation Lab Mentors.

title: Industry Hiring Panel
description: Join us for a panel discussion with industry professionals from various companies to learn about the latest trends in AI and how to prepare for the job market.

title: Molly Slawson w/ Michael Best
description: Welcoming Michael Best (A law firm!) for a talk on AI Intellectual Property! This is VERY important for the future of AI, as the debate for who owns what becomes more and more heated!

title: HacksGiving Kick-off
description: Kickoff for HacksGiving! Come compete is the Thanksgiving Hackathon partnered w/ Non-Profit Discovery World!

title: HacksGiving Finals
description: Come present your HacksGiving projects! Discovery World is incredibly grateful for the work you all did!

title: Winter Semester Celebration
description: Come celebrate all the hard work you did this semester! We will be playing games, eating food, and having an AI Club Raffle!

title: Paul Rinaldi Career Advice
description: Paul Rinaldi, a MSOE Alumm, consultant at Thoughtworks, will be speaking about his career path and how he got to where he is today.

title: Web Scraping Workshop
description: Come learn how to scrape the web for data! This is an incredible useful and common tool in the AI industry.

title: Mercury Marine
description: Come hear from Mercury Marine about their use of AI in their manufacturing process!

title: Innovation Lab Kick-Off
description: Kickoff for the Juno Innovation Lab! Come see how AI is disrupting the tax industry.

title: Spring Break Celebration & Elections
description: As the year is coming to an end, we will be electing the new AI Club eboard. Come vote, eat, play games, and win raffle prizes!

title: Joe Poeschl w/ MKE Tech Hub
description: Come hear from Joe Poeschl, the Director of MKE Tech Hub, about the future of AI in Milwaukee!

title: MICS Practice Preso
description: Come learn about the incredible work our Research Groups have been doing over the past year!

title: MICS Research Conference
description: Research Groups will be showing off their work at a regional AI Research Conference!

title: SVP of AI w/ Associated Bank
description: Come hear from the SVP of AI at Associated Bank about the future of AI in the banking industry!

title: Consulting Advice w/ Sabrina Stangler
description: Come hear from Sabrina Stangler, the CEO of Curious Bean, about her career path and how she got to where she is today as a software consultant.

title: Rosie Competition
description: Come support the AI Club as all 5 finalists are from AI Club!

title: End of the Semester Celebration
description: Come celebrate all the hard work you did all year! We will be playing games, eating food, and having an AI Club Raffle!

title: Org Fair 2025!
description: Come to the MSOE Involvement Fair to learn about the many clubs and organizations at MSOE! Stop by the AI Club booth for a free AI Club Stress Brain & Candy!

title: MAIC 25-26 Kickoff!
description: Welcome to the AI Club! Open to all majors-freshmen encouraged! Come learn who we are, what we do, and how YOU can get involved.

title: Rosie Access For Everyone!
description: Come learn how to get access to ROSIE, the supercomputer in Diercks Hall! Get your AI journey started with ROSIE!

title: Intro to Hands-on Projects
description: Come learn about the many hands-on projects the AI Club has to offer. Join an Innovation Lab or a Research Group to work with your peers, build an incredible portfolio piece with a student mentor, and compete for large cash prizes!

title: Resume Blitz
description: Come learn from Real Engineers about how to write a resume that stands out! The event will be in DH 110 from 4:30-6:30pm!

title: Hands On Projects Celebration
description: This is the largest event of the year! Come meet your mentor and teammates for Research Groups and Innovation Labs. Also, hear from the Innovation Lab Sponsor, who is providing the $6,000 prize pool!

title: Wolfram Alpha: Modern AI Leadership
description: Come hear from the Modern AI Leaders at Wolfram Alpha about the future of AI & Leadership! This is a great opportunity to connect with potential employers!

title: Databricks: John Young, Managing Director
description: Join us for a conversation with John Young from Databricks, an MSOE alumnus, on the latest wave of AI tooling and what it takes to build AI-native products at scale. John will share an inside look at life at a hyper-growth, AI-forward company; his path from MSOE to upper management at a ~$100B startup; how Databricks thinks about hiring; and practical ways for students to access large compute on the platform.

title: Milwaukee Tool: The Power of Data in AI
description: Come hear from Milwaukee Tool about the power of data in their manufacturing process!

title: Netflix: from MSOE to FAANG
description: Come hear from Netflix about their journey from MSOE to FAANG!

title: Hacksgiving Kickoff w/ the Milwaukee Domes Alliance
description: Come learn about the Milwaukee Domes Alliance and how you can get involved in the Hacksgiving Competition for a $6000 prize pool!

title: Hacksgiving Finals
description: Come present your Hacksgiving projects! Discovery World is incredibly grateful for the work you all did!

title: Winter Semester Celebration
description: Come celebrate all the hard work you did this semester! We will be playing games, eating food, and having an AI Club Raffle!

title: Hack4Health Hackathon
description: Come learn about the Hack4Health Hackathon and how you can get involved!

title: College to Corporate
description: Come listen to Kevin Ratay & Brian Balboni discuss their career paths from college to corporate!

title: Intro to Agentic AI Workshop
description: Come learn about the latest trends in AI and how to get started with Agentic AI!

title: Innovation Lab Kick-Off: Persistent Systems
description: Come learn about the latest trends in AI and how to get started with Persistent Systems!

title: Steve Glynn: Chief Milwaukee Officer
description: Come hear from Steve Glynn, the Chief Milwaukee Officer, about the future of AI in Milwaukee!

title: Semester Celebration & Eboard Elections
description: Come celebrate all the hard work you did this semester! We will be electing the new AI Club eboard. Come vote, eat, play games, and win raffle prizes!

title: Quantum @ IBM: George Paulik
description: Come hear from George Paulik, discussing the future of AI & Quantum Computing!

title: MSOE to NVIDIA
description: Come hear about Nigel Nelson's experience from MSOE to leading incredible AI systems at NVIDIA!
